title: thakat thakat thaka
sahitya:
takat takat takat takatakavenrADOmO shiva shakti shaktiyenru pAdOMO
caraNam 1 agatta shuddagattinilE uLninrAL avaL ammaiyammai emmainADu poivenrAL
takat taka namakkaruL purivAL tAlonrE sharaNamenru vAzhndiDuvOm nAmenrE

   caraNam 2  pughappu kappukavinbamaDA pOdellAm purattinilE taLLiDuvAi shUdellAm
guhaikku engE irukkudaDA tI pOla adu kuzhandai adan tAyaDikkIzh pOi pOlE

   caraNam 3  mighanda kaippaDu kaLiyinilE meishOra un vIram vandu shOrvai venru kaitEra
jagattiluLLa manidarellAm nanru nanrena nAm shadiruDanE tAnamishai piraNDumonrEn

   caraNam 4  indiranAr-ulaginilE nallinbam irukkudenpAr adanai ingE koNDEidi
mantiram pOl vENDumaDA shollinbam nallamadamuravE amuda nilai kaNDEidit-
